mainSection.title: Automate collections with empathy and efficiency
mainSection.subtitle: Buildnow AI helps collection agencies and financial services firms scale their recovery efforts by automating outbound calls, negotiating payments, and escalating only when necessary — all while maintaining a human tone and meeting strict compliance standards.

bulletPoints.title: Polite and persistent outbound calls
bulletPoints.description: Our AI agents place payment reminders at scale, improving contact rates and freeing your team from routine follow-ups.

bulletPoints.title: Flexible payment negotiations
bulletPoints.description: AI agents offer pre-approved payment plans and guide debtors through options, escalating only when needed for manual review.

bulletPoints.title: Real-time escalation to human agents
bulletPoints.description: Seamlessly transfer complex or sensitive cases to your team with full context, ensuring a smooth and respectful experience for all parties.

ctaSection.title: See Buildnow AI in action

secondarySection.title: Built for compliance, scale, and performance

bulletPoints.title: Scalable without hiring
